member.name: T:System.Reflection.AssemblyEqualityComparer
member.summary: Encapsulates methods to support the comparison of assemblies for equality.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.AssemblyEqualityComparer.Equals(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified assemblies are equal.
member.returns: true if the specified assemblies are equal; otherwise, false.
member.exception: Throws if one of the specified assemblies is null

member.name: M:System.Reflection.AssemblyEqualityComparer.GetHashCode(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Returns a hash code for the specified assembly.
member.param: The for which a hash code is to be returned.
member.returns: A hash code for the specified assembly.

member.name: T:System.Reflection.AssemblyExtensions
member.summary: Provides a set of static methods extending the class

member.name: M:System.Reflection.AssemblyExtensions.GetReferencedAssemblies(System.Reflection.Assembly,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Recursively finds all referenced assemblies of the specified assembly
member.param: An assembly to find referenced assemblies
Application configuration containing project name separator value
